verses.text: \w Help|strong="H3467"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for the godly \w man|strong="H2623"\w* \w ceaseth|strong="H1584"\w*; for the \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w fail|strong="H6461"\w* from among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 12.1 \ft upon…: or, upon the eighth\f*\f + \fr 12.1 \ft Help: or, Save\f*

They \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: \add with\add* \w flattering|strong="H2513"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add and\add* with a \w double|strong="H3820"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* do they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.\f + \fr 12.2 \ft a double…: Heb. an heart and an heart\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* all \w flattering|strong="H2513"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \add and\add* the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* that \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w proud|strong="H1419"\w* things:\f + \fr 12.3 \ft proud: Heb. great\f*

Who have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, With our \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* will we \w prevail|strong="H1396"\w*; our \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add are\add* our own: who \add is\add* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* over us?\f + \fr 12.4 \ft are…: Heb. are with us\f*

For the \w oppression|strong="H7701"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, for the \w sighing|strong="H0603"\w* of the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, now will I \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; I will \w set|strong="H7896"\w* \add him\add* in \w safety|strong="H3468"\w* \add from him that\add* \w puffeth|strong="H6315"\w* at him.\f + \fr 12.5 \ft puffeth…: or, would ensnare him\f*

The \w words|strong="H0565"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add are\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w words|strong="H0565"\w*: \add as\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w tried|strong="H6884"\w* in a \w furnace|strong="H5948"\w* of \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w purified|strong="H2212"\w* seven \w times|strong="H7659"\w*.

Thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* them, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou shalt \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* them from \w this|strong="H2098"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft them from: Heb. him, etc: that is, every one of them, etc\f*

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, when the \w vilest|strong="H2149"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* are \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft men: Heb. of the sons of the men\f*
